desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Perform up to three forward slashes, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: During each slash, pressing <IconSpecial /> triggers Scorchwind, causing the attack to deal increased <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.

BasicAttackBlazingWindMistySlash.name: Basic Attack: Blazing Wind - Misty Slash

desc.0: While in the Molten Edge state, press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash up to four forward slashes, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If Manato's HP is above 30% when the skill is activated, 3.5% of his Max HP will be consumed.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Perform a shoulder slam forward, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

DodgeCounterRadiantBladeBattleSweep.name: Dodge Counter: Radiant Blade - Battle Sweep

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Perform a slash followed by a punch at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Slash forward at enemies, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If hit by an enemy during the skill, restore 20% of missing HP when unleashing the slash. The healing effects of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice</ct> have a shared cooldown and can trigger once every 20s.
desc.3: If hit by an enemy during the skill, the slash is enhanced.
desc.4: DMG taken is reduced by 40% while using this skill.
desc.5: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

SpecialAttackReturnToAshesSacrifice.name: Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice

desc.0: Hold <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Enter a charging state, consuming up to 10% of Max HP and gaining 100 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct>. HP consumption will at most reduce Manato's HP to 30% of Max HP.
desc.2: Release the button to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes</ct>. If struck during the skill, the slash heals 20% of missing HP. The healing effects of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice</ct> have a shared cooldown and can trigger once every 20s.
desc.3: If hit by an enemy during the skill or if charging reaches a certain duration, the slash is enhanced.
desc.4: DMG taken is reduced by 40% while using this skill.
desc.5: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackReturnToAshesFall.name: EX Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Fall

desc.0: While in the Molten Edge state and with sufficient Adrenaline, press <IconSpecialReadyRp /> to activate:
desc.1: Jump up and unleash a falling slash on enemies in front, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Upon activating the skill, restore 33% of Max HP.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Hurls his sword forward, then charges the enemy to trigger an explosion, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Jump into the air and deliver a falling slash at enemies in front, followed by an explosion, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes and punches enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

DefensiveAssistLoneShadowMountainStand.name: Defensive Assist: Lone Shadow - Mountain Stand

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, inflicting massive Daze and dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Gain 75 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct> upon activating this skill.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

AssistFollowUpLoneShadowBreakingFang.name: Assist Follow-Up: Lone Shadow - Breaking Fang

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash multiple slashes at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeated presses allow up to 7 extra consecutive slashes.
desc.3: During the consecutive slashes, if Manato's HP is above 30%, 2% of Max HP is consumed.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable when activating this skill.
desc.5: The DMG taken during the consecutive slashes is reduced by 60%, and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased.

desc.0: Manato gains extra Sheer Force based on his Max HP, with every 1 point of Max HP increasing Sheer Force by 0.1.
desc.1: All <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> Manato deals is Sheer DMG, ignoring enemy DEF and using his Sheer Force stat as the DMG Multiplier.
desc.2: When Manato uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice</ct> or a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, he accumulates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct>, up to a maximum of 100 points. At 75 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct>, Manato enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato consumes {EXCEL:5} <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct> per second. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct> is fully depleted, he exits <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct>.
desc.3: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> are enhanced, and he can use <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Fall</ct>.
desc.4: When consuming HP during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Blazing Wind - Misty Slash</ct> or during the consecutive slashes from an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, that attack's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct>, and the Adrenaline Generation Rate increases by 100%.
desc.5: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and his <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct>.

desc.0: Manato gains extra Sheer Force based on his Max HP, with every 1 point of Max HP increasing Sheer Force by 0.1.
desc.1: All <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> Manato deals is Sheer DMG, ignoring enemy DEF and using his Sheer Force stat as the DMG Multiplier.
desc.2: When Manato uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice</ct> or a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, he accumulates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct>, up to a maximum of 100 points. At 75 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct>, Manato enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato consumes {EXCEL:5} <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct> per second. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Heart</ct> is fully depleted, he exits <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct>.
desc.3: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> are enhanced, and he can use <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Fall</ct>.
desc.4: When consuming HP during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Blazing Wind - Misty Slash</ct> or during the consecutive slashes from an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, that attack's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>29.2%</ct>, and the Adrenaline Generation Rate increases by 100%.
desc.5: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and his <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>11.7%</ct>.

desc.5: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and his <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Support</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Stun</ct> character:
desc.1: When Manato uses his Ultimate, he gains 8 stacks of Remnant Flame, and when using a Chain Attack, he gains 4 stacks of Remnant Flame, lasting 60s, stacking up to 20 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While launching <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Blazing Wind - Misty Slash</ct> or during the consecutive slashes of an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, if his HP is below 100% of Max HP, one stack of Remnant Flame is consumed to restore 2% of his Max HP.

1.name: Drifter's Rules of Survival
1.desc: As Manato's HP decreases, his HP lost is accumulated. Each 1% of his Max HP accumulated increases the <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Ups</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> by 0.4%, up to a max of 20%.

flavor.1: The once-kind voices, the warm lights, the joyful promises... all vanished without a farewell. Being formless, even the sharpest fangs could not hold them, nor the sharpest claws grasp them.
flavor.2: "I can eat just about anything, and I'm not too afraid of the cold — if there's a 'secret to surviving,' maybe it's just that."

2.name: Drifter's Rules of Survival
2.desc: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Molten Edge</ct> state, Manato ignores 8% of a target's <ct color=#FF5521>Fire RES</ct>. After being hit by an enemy while using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice</ct>, press <IconNormal /> to trigger an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>.

flavor.0: Perhaps a peaceful family is like this — Manato, A-Cing and A-Yuet all think of themselves as the fortunate "child picked up and brought home."
flavor.1: If there's anything left worth arguing about, it's probably just "who should eat the last piece of vegetable."
flavor.2: "It doesn't taste good? I'll ask at Yum Cha Sin if maybe I made a mistake somewhere..."
flavor.3: "...Trade secret?! But last time... I just stood there while the chef told me everything."

3.name: Enter the Realm of Urban Legends
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Getting established on a forum starts with a memorable nickname — everyone thinks they're bad at it, but for a dog Thiren who sometimes has to stay back for make-up exams in literature, it's especially tough.
flavor.1: "...You already know it, don’t you? It's, uh... ahem, SailumeSadLoneGhost"
flavor.3: "Damn it. One of these days, I'm changing it to 'Mention My Old Name Again and I'll See You in the Hollow.'"

4.name: Childhood Oath
4.desc: Max HP increases by 8%. During <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes - Sacrifice</ct>, when Manato takes fatal DMG, he remains in battle, with his HP not dropping below 1.

flavor.0: Maybe every teenager imagines themselves as a lone wolf with cold eyes... but Masato had an edge in that regard.
flavor.1: If not for the appearance of the drowned ideals, he could have gone on pretending nothing had ever happened, just like everyone else.
flavor.2: "Like I said, that was just how I thought when I was eight—"
flavor.3: "So this is what a 'friend' is... You didn't treat me like I was fragile, but you didn't treat me like a person either."

5.name: Lone Shadow Returns to the Pack
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: In truth, despite the barrier his appearance put up, Masato was popular with everyone.
flavor.1: Some made friends with him, some looked to him for shelter, and some... tried to rope him into advertising.
flavor.2: "Sorry, I'm probably not the right choice to promote your shop."
flavor.3: "As for 'bench pressing,' I've never done it — unless you're referring to... being forced down by Ethereals and pushing up my greatsword to keep their claws off me?"

6.name: Beyond Dreams of the Past
6.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Return to Ashes</ct> hits a Stunned enemy, Manato gains 75 Blazing Heart and 4 stacks of Remnant Flame, and pressing <IconNormal /> will launch an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>. This Remnant Flame effect can trigger once every 20s. When his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct> hits an enemy, Manato's <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> increases by 3% for 8s, stacking up to 5 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
